description.value:
Action Cost: [Free] (declared when making weaving roll) Frequency: Wisdom + Tier times per long rest Effect: When you make a weaving roll, you can declare "Harmonic" to reroll one die (Potential OR Mastery, your choice). You must take the new result. Your perfect self-knowledge allows you to adjust reality's response to your will.

Eldritch Pact Abilities
